DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the relative bioequivalence of Eplerenone 50 mg Tablets Under Fed Conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Bioavailability Study of Eplerenone 50 mg Tablets Under Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal finding on physical exam, medical history, or clinical laboratory results on screening. Positive test results for HIV or hepatitis B or C. Treatment for drug or alcohol dependence.
